title: 728. Week 6 Big Games, Rookie QB Report Card, Trending Topics & MNF Preview
itunes:title: 728. Week 6 Big Games, Rookie QB Report Card, Trending Topics & MNF Preview
description:
Daniel Jeremiah, Bucky Brooks and Rhett Lewis look back at the weekend and all the action from Week 6 of the NFL season. The guys start by breaking down the big 3 games from Sunday. Next, the trio focus on the Los Angeles Chargers vs. Baltimore Ravens game. After that, the guys discuss 8 trending topics from the week. Then, the trio give a grade to the rookies that played based off their Week 6 performances. Following that, the guys explain why the Miami Dolphins moving up in the 2021 NFL Draft to take wide receiver Jaylen Waddle wasn't the right move. To wrap up the show, DJ, Bucky and Rhett preview the Monday Night Football game between the Buffalo Bills and Tennessee Titans.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
